ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Although it is a history of art class, I would also note that I learned a lot about history itself. Also, this course was very helpful for reflecting on such matters as memory and trauma.
- visual analysis - considering the elements of artistic production - considering the limits of different photographic methods - considering the different narratives circulating about the Civil War
I gained a great deal of knowledge about the American Civil War and the history of photography.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: One of the greatest things about this course is how Professor Raab makes use of the resources at Yale (at Beinecke, YUAG, Medical Library, etc.): often students are not quite aware of the collections our university has. But that's just one thing; the syllabus was also great, and the discussions were very interesting.

The course provided a rich exploration of the topics related to memorializing the Civil War, but the conversations developed ideas that were usefully applicable in thinking about cultural memory more broadly. The use of archival materials and university collections added a lot to the course experience.

- great integration of Yale art exhibitions and special collections resources - well organized syllabus - strong seminar discussion - conversation often became narrowly focused on the artistic process and neglected exploring the implications for current day debates about public commemoration of the Civil War

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: I would definitely recommend it to another student.
Yes! This was a great class.
